inclusion.criterion: Must understand the risks and the benefits/purpose of the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must be 18 years at time of signing the informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to participate in all required evaluations and procedures in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have a diagnosis of DM based upon the characteristic cutaneous findings proposed by Sontheimer[6] and/or a skin biopsy consistent with DM
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be candidate for systemic therapy for their DM skin disease defined by inadequate response to aggressive sun protection along with the use of potent topical corticosteroids and/or immunomodulators
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Increasing or changing dose of topical therapy within 14 days of study day 0
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of any clinically significant (as determined by the investigators) cardiac, endocrinologic, pulmonary, neurologic, psychiatric, hepatic, renal, hematologic, immunologic, or other major uncontrolled disease
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of severe 'exploding' headache and abnormal vasculature with a draining vein from L temporal lobe consistent with AVM. She was discharged to home with her husband on [**2155-12-6**].
